Header: Ex-DIG Senanayake and ex-OIC Perera re-remanded
Content: Former senior DIG Anura Senanayake and the former Crimes OIC of the Narahenpita Police Sumith Perera, arrested in connection to the death of rugby player Wasim Thajudeen, were re-remanded till the 16 th this month. The case was taken up today before Colombo Additional Magistrate Nishantha Peiris. Meanwhile, the lawyer appearing on behalf of the Attorney General informed Courts today, that they have commenced an investigation into telephone calls received by the mobile phone used by Narahenpita Crime Branch OIC, on the day the homicide took place. He also informed Courts that investigations are underway to probe the manner in which Malabe Private Medical School obtained 26 human body parts.
